name: html-fragments-demo
description: Proof of concept demo for using HTML fragments as a transfer format between the client and server.

scripts.build: npm run -s clean && mkdir -p build/client/routing/ && npm run -s copy-assets && npm run -s build-ts
scripts.copy-assets: cp client/*.html client/*.css build/client/ && cp client/routing/*.html build/client/routing/

author: Douglas Parker
